data.text:
"Viva Las Vegas" - that's our motto, and that's why we surprised every person on board a recent Vegas-bound flight with $100 in Ticketmaster® Ticket Cash® for the ultimate Vegas vacation!

(Ticketmaster and Ticket Cash are registered trademarks of Live Nation Entertainment, Inc.) https://t.co/W81WqUIyHz
RT @blue: please place your seats and tray tables in their locked and upright positions ? https://t.co/PSp8dldxHW
Don't over think it, just keep it plane and simple. 🙂 https://t.co/WMFelrOhPM
Introducing Allegiant's Signature Snack Packs! Whether you're craving the Big Box or the Deluxe Wingz Kids Snack Pack, be sure to try one on your next flight! 😋 https://t.co/5Jy9py8rIP

urls.title: Allways Anniversary Giveaway - Allegiant Air
urls.description: Enter for a chance to Win our Allways 1 Year Anniversary Giveaway

data.text:
When's the best time to celebrate? #ALLWAYS, of course, but especially on the first anniversary of our loyalty program, Allways Rewards!

To celebrate, we're giving you a chance to win flights for a year and MORE! Enter now: https://t.co/ejREtvvVBf.

📸: miss_rizzo https://t.co/LoSveXPdcC

urls.title: Home Page - Airline Ratings

The Qantas Group has announced a profit upgrade for the first half of FY2023 ending December 31, 2022, with the airline now... By Sumesh Patel, President, Asia Pacific, SITAAccording to the latest data, Australia is seeing a strong resurgence in... Korean Air has showcased

data.text:

data.text:
Pack those bags because your next vacation is one nonstop flight away! 😎🧳

📸: dylank photography https://t.co/Ap0ht472WO

While working his 276th flight with Allegiant, Eli noticed an incredible coincidence when he saw the aircraft number!

Coincidence or fate? You decide! https://t.co/UJIf3WhwF3

Meet Morgan and her sister, Hailey, two adorable little girls who melted the hearts of our entire crew. After the other passengers exited our plane, Morgan and Hailey had a little fun in the flight deck and before saying goodbye, Morgan asked for a photo with all her new friends. https://t.co/Y1BmbP9mHm

Loving this sun-kissed summer glow.

📸: abe.spotting https://t.co/2KL5WuRGeI

To celebrate his retirement, Captain Harry had a special copilot by his side - his son, Vincent.

"...watching him set the parking brake for the last time with Allegiant was emotional because I know how much flying means to him.” – Vincent

 Like father, like son. #FathersDay https://t.co/IFfDstIVA3

The Allegiant team is officially 5,000 strong! #TogetherWeFly

Interested in joining our team? Apply today at https://t.co/S5Vg9VxnN9. https://t.co/63qmCYm1Tn

data.text:
If it takes three great white sharks to equal the length of a megalodon - the largest shark to ever live - how many megalodons does it take to equal the length of an A320?

Two. It only takes two. 😲

Happy #NationalMegalodonDay.

📸: kmaviation https://t.co/wltVC5KNgU

Did you know the air you breathe on board is completely replaced every three minutes? #TheMoreYouKnow

📸: travelwmase https://t.co/LnjMgrfj5I

Summer adventures await. 😎

📸: 757usairways https://t.co/RGfhSf7wGY

data.text:
🏈 The 2022 - 2023 football schedule is officially out, so you're on the clock to score the best deals on travel packages for games at @AllegiantStadm! 🏈

Get your flights, hotel, game tickets and more now only at https://t.co/Z48IktK9Yu.

📸: @Raiders https://t.co/uYz2taZdq1

Allegiant couldn't operate without the dedicated members of our team who begin their workday at nightfall and head home at sunrise.

The next time you travel, be sure to remember the "third shift." Their hard work is vital to each and every flight. #NationalThirdShiftWorkersDay https://t.co/BWTopuZKt7

Nonstop > Layovers

Plain and simple. Who's with us? 🙋‍♀️🙋‍♂️

📸: rishalpdx https://t.co/JGF7FYGM3e

Drop the balloons and cue the confetti cannons! We're welcoming seven new nonstop routes to our network. https://t.co/SzsH0s9P1A

Oh, the places you will go...

📸: staceywindow https://t.co/Y4Ub9brdje
We're #allways ready to welcome you on board! https://t.co/ObAEciXjKz

data.text:
Vegas born. Vegas proud.

Congratulations to the @GoldenKnights on an unforgettable season full of outstanding wins, fierce battles, and tons of fun for every fan. #GoKnightsGo

📸: klas.spotting https://t.co/GOylz1YUDh

It's been our privilege to partner with @MakeAWish for more than a decade, making wishes come true for thousands of young people. Today, let's honor the lives this organization has touched and celebrate the joy that is yet to come with each wish granted. #WorldWishDay https://t.co/xLZW5BKfcG

They dreamt they could fly, and so they did. 👩‍✈️👨‍✈️

Happy #WorldPilotsDay to pilots everywhere! https://t.co/dqzO3yenKz

data.text: One thing's for sure - the Bad Guys made the ultimate getaway. See how they took to the skies on a very special Allegiant aircraft in honor of @Dreamworks' "The Bad Guys" with a sneak peek from our team. And don't forget to see the movie, which is in theaters now! #TheBadGuys https://t.co/OKCCJOyJMM
Say "hey" to our newest graduating class of Allegiant flight attendants! 👋🥳 https://t.co/MvAXuF3L2E

data.text:
To mask or not to mask, that is your choice. Consistent with TSA guidance, all Allegiant customers and team members may wear a mask if they choose to, but are no longer required while traveling with us.

📸: syracuseairport https://t.co/6kCC50Kf1Y

data.text:
What better way to start your day than with THREE new nonstop routes just in time for summer?? 

💙 Des Moines, IA  ➡ New York City, NY/ Newark, NJ
🧡 Idaho Falls, ID ➡ Santa Ana/ Orange County, CA
💛 Las Vegas, NV ➡ Orlando/ Sanford, FL

📸:  ksavspotter https://t.co/UboIzpirWV

data.text: Serving as an Inflight Base Supervisor for two airports might seem like a lot, but it's all in a day's work for Greg. He's responsible for supporting our Inflight crew at Allegiant's bases in both Phoenix-Mesa and Los Angeles, as well as supervising both airports' operations. https://t.co/4lk6cssRJE

It's that time again. Let's see if you can #NameThatAirport! 

Hint: This year, this airport is celebrating 75 years of service! 🥳🎉 https://t.co/vsbTH8u18D

A little desert sun is always in season.

📸: valleyplanespotting https://t.co/QjifwaV0dz

urls.title: Top Ten Safest Low-Cost Airlines for 2022 - Airline Ratings
urls.description: AirlineRatings.com. the world’s only safety, product, and COVID-19 rating agency, has listed its top ten safest low-cost airlines for 2022 from the 385 airlines it monitors. Low-cost carriers (LCCs) have allowed millions of people to travel for the first time or to take trips they would otherwise be unable to afford. The AirlineRatings top 10 […]
